London Mathematical Biology Conference

2nd London Mathematical Biology Conference is anounced!

The 2nd edition of the London Mathematical Biology Conference will take place on the 9th-10th December of 2024 at The Francis Crick Institute. As we gear up for this event we welcome suggestions to the organization of the conference. If you have ideas to share, please donâ€™t hesitate to reach out to us at londonmathbio@gmail.com.
